page.title: 12TREDINGTON HEAD QUESTIONAIRE
page.content: In the school there are 7 teachers. 3 full time, 3 part time and 1 French. The school cater for children from four and a half to eleven years old. The school is very small because there are only 50 pupils. There are only three classes. They have a{piano}and the{electrical equipment}are two record players, a T.V. printing machine, tape recorder, cooker, fridge, kettle, heaters and a slide projector. They used to have a computer but it was stolen. During the strike the teachers kept on working. They have a staffroom. They have a{school uniform}but they do not have to wear it. The colours are navy blue, white and grey. They have two spare rooms, library remedial and French. These are now all terrapins.
